title: Bug 21133Can't import prefernces from file with no extension
description: Bug 21133Can't import prefernces from file with no extension
EB: If you choose a file with no extension,the .epf extension is automatically added to the filename, even if the<filemane.epf file does not exist.Importing preferences should not automatically add the extension. If the userhas chosen a file with no extension, Eclipse should at least try to load thepreferences from that file. If loading the preferences from that file fails,only then should Eclipse try to load from <filename.epf.
SR: Build GM6When you hit the Import button on the preferences page, you are allowed to picka file from a list of existing files.
